member.name: M:Couchbase.Lite.Support.NetDesktop.Activate
member.summary: Activates the support classes for .NET Core / .NET Framework

member.name: M:Couchbase.Lite.Support.NetDesktop.EnableTextLogging(System.String)
member.summary: Turns on text based logging for debugging purposes. The logs will be written to the directory specified in
member.param: The directory to write logs to

member.name: M:Couchbase.Lite.Support.NetDesktop.SetBinaryLogDirectory(System.String)
member.summary: Directs the binary log files to write to the specified directory. Useful if the default directory does not have write permission.
member.param: The path to write binary logs to

member.name: T:Couchbase.Lite.Support.FileLogger
member.summary: A default logging implementation that has a virtual method for doing the actual log writing (useful as a base class to get preformatted messages for a custom logger)
